a.n: La Belle HélEne En Coulisses, A L'opéra De Lausanne

p.d: An immersive visit behind the scenes at the Opéra de Lausanne, during the preparations for La Belle Hélene and its performance, under the musical direction of Pierre Dumoussaud. The stage director Michel Fau and his team recount their vision of the work by Jacques Offenbach: baroque, over-the-top and surrealist. Directed by: Gary Grenier (Switzerland, 2019)
